title: Himi 13
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e me’a lelei lahi,
Pea angatonu,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē
Ke kau ki he lotu.
2.
Ko e lotu Folofola
‘A hotau ‘Otua
Ko e koloa totonu
Ki he laumālie.
3.
He ‘oku fai ‘a e lotu
‘A hotau ‘Otua,
Hangē ko e Folofola
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio.
4.
He ko hono fakama’unga
‘A e Folofola,
Mo hono faka’ilonga
Ke tau ‘ilo ia.
5.
Ko e afo kuo falō
‘A e Folofola,
Ko e me’a fua ia
Ki he laumālie.
6.
‘Oku tupu ‘i he lotu,
‘A hotau ‘Otua
‘A e poto ke tau ‘ilo,
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio.
7.
’Oku ngāue ‘i loto
‘A e Folofola,
‘O ne fakatupu fo’ou
‘A e angahala. *
